title: Project-Based Learning Design for Historical Context and Educational Application of Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding foundational theories in educational technology and data analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Case Studies and Ethical Considerations of Learning Analytics Tools in Language Education

learning_goals: Learners can explain the historical development of learning analytics by categorizing it into four stages.
Learners can compare and present the differences between educational data mining and learning analytics.
Learners can apply the linkage between theoretical frameworks and learning analytics techniques in project design.
Learners can identify ethical issues that may arise when utilizing learning analytics tools in language education.
Learners can form small project teams to develop learning analytics-based instructional design plans.

resources: Open-source data visualization tools compatible with smartphones
Foundational textbooks on educational theory (library loan)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
